text:
VOICES OP EUROPE
NOo 65 (final program of the series)
Duration: 29* 20H
Herr Pranz Lipovsky and Pastor Kurt Norell
On how to help poeple and how not to
Background: When Franz Lipovsky was two years old in Vienna, his
mother died* When he was seven his father, an unskilled worker,
went to war* That was 1914* Although Franz9s father was not
killed until 1918, Pran% never saw hlro again* Like his father
before him, he became an apprentice. Today Herr Lipovsky works
in the office of education of the city of Vienna, but in between
then and now a lot of things happened to Herr Lipovsky* Pastor
Kurt Norell is a minister of the Lutheran Church, the state church
of Sweden, who, however, has never had a parish* He is warden of
Blrkagarten, the first and most famous settlement house in Sweden*
